former things. God has power to foretell things to come, as he has in the past. Specifically, he foretold the miraculous deliverance of Israel under the leadership of Moses (42:9; 43:9; 46:9).

my mouth. The Lord speaks directly to his prophets and to all who will hearken. When he speaks to us through the prophets, it is as if he has spoken directly to each of us (D&C 1:38).

showed them. He made his purposes manifest through his prophets.
